text: the sequence of events started with a
hired white van driving at speed across
London Bridge we saw this van coming on
the wrong side of the road this hill
smashed in the front just one headlight
was working and for it to be driving on
the wrong side it was quite weird and it
was going pretty fast and in my mind I
was thinking probably the brakes had
failed or something because he looked
weird and out of place
people fled in panic as three men got
out of the van and started stabbing
people in the busy pubs and restaurants
we just heard commotion you know glass
smashing you know tables and chairs
being tipped over lots of screaming
according to several eyewitnesses the
suspects were shouting as they carried
out their attack running up gayness is
for Allah when I first see him they
witnesses for Allah and they run up a
stablish girl I don't know many times 10
times maybe 15 times and I she was gonna
help me help me and I could not do
enough the evidence of these people who
witnessed the attack will now be central
to the police investigation into
precisely what happened Andy Moore BBC
News
